content:
808 
 
NOVENA  
  
   (xvi) GOUU same as in Political Science and International 
Relations.  
(xvii) PAUL requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes at not more 
than two (2) sittings including English Language, 
Mathematics and three (3) Arts/Social Science subjects.  
(xviii) BSU requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes from any Social 
Science or Arts subjects.  
(xix) WESTERN-DEL same as in Political Science and Public 
Administration.  
(xx) JABU requires at least 'O' level pass in Mathematics.  
(xxi) NDU requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes in English 
Language, Mathematics, Government or History and three 
(3) other subjects at not more than two (2) sittings.  
(xxii) KWASU requires ‘O’ level credit passes in English Language, 
Mathematics, Government and a ny two (2) other Social 
Science subjects.  
(xxiii) ABUAD requires 'O' level credit passes in English language, 
Mathematics, Government and any other two (2) Social 
Science subjects.  
(xxiv) GOUU requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes to include 
English Language, Mathematics, History or Government or 
Economics and two (2) Science, Arts or Social Science 
subjects.  
(xxv) UMYUK requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes in English 
Language, Mathematics, and any two (2) Social Science 
subjects and any other one (1) Arts subject a t not more 
than two (2) sittings.  
(xxvi) FED-OYE EKITI requires ‘O’ level credit pass in Mathematics 
and one (1) Science subject.  
(xxvii) KSU requires ‘O’ level credit passes in Mathematics, English 
Language, Economics/Geography/Government and any 
two (2) other relevant subjects.  
(xxviii) PHC requires  ‘O’ level credit passes in English Language, 
Mathematics and any three (3) others from Social Science 
and Arts subjects.  
(xxix) FED-DUTSINMA requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes in  
Government or History/Civic Education, English, 
Mathematics and any two (2) other subjects.  
  
UTME SUBJECTS
